title: 登山钩 GrapplingHook for 1.26
author: Snowsore
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Snowsore 于 2010-12-11 03:46 编辑 

【MOD名稱】GrapplingHook
【MOD版本】1.33
【MOD原帖】来吧
【MOD下載】



GrapplingHook303-1.33.zip
(19.35 KB, 下载次数: 247)



2010-12-11 03:23 上传
点击文件名下载附件






【MOD簡介】
使用方法变了
A deliciously imbalanced multi-purpose device. It launches a straight flying hook .

左键点击发出
再按一次收回
如果你够到了砖块...你可以让他靠近
如果抓到了怪物...那他就要靠近你
Reversing the pull direction pushes you away from the hook and mobs away from you. 
Fixing the rope length prevents you/mobs from moving a greater distance from the hook/you. Mine ores in vertical shafts. Take that creeper for a walk. Push that nasty skeleton into lava. 
Move while dangling from a fixed rope to swing awkwardly. 
Swap which entity is affected when you catch a mob. 
Enable gravity gun mode and fix the rope length, then grab a mob to manipulate it. Also works the other way around in swap mode. 
Enable gravity gun mode and fix the rope length, then hook onto a block. Swing around using your mouse. 
Pull yourself closer/farther away while in fixed mode by pressing the pull key. 
pling yourself or the grabbed mob using the fling key. Also works in reversed mode. This is similar to the way Cheeseyx's Hookshot works. 
Now works with minecarts/boats again. 
Also works with ghast fireballs. 
Somewhat works with arrows and items. 
Move blocks around in grab mode. Hook a block and move it around. You can fling blocks, pull/push them etc. If you hook a cactus and touch hostile mobs with it, they will hunt after it and won't hurt you. Let go of the grappling hook or disable grab mode to turn the mobile block back into a normal block.

按键
pull = LCONTROL
fix = X
reverse = V
swap = C
gravity = G
fling = N 


已经不行了...看不懂了...用法已经变得很复杂繁琐...
【MOD效果】





1.png (1.72 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

此mod需要ModLoader-1.22+303-1.0
安装方法
用某种方法打开.minecraft.jar(请先备份)
删除META-INF
解压并覆盖压缩文件里的文件
进入游戏
